Category.Name: InterfaceInformation
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all Interface Information features of the Interface module.
Category.Description: Category that contains all Interface Information features of the Interface module.

Category.Name: DeviceEnumeration
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all Device Enumeration features of the Interface module.
Category.Description: Category that contains all Device Enumeration features of the Interface module.

String.Name: InterfaceID
String.ToolTip: Transport layer Producer wide unique identifier of the selected interface.
String.Description: Transport layer Producer wide unique identifier of the selected interface.

String.Name: InterfaceDisplayName
String.ToolTip: User readable name of the selected interface.
String.Description: User readable name of the selected interface.

Enumeration.Name: InterfaceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transport layer type of the interface.
Enumeration.Description: Transport layer type of the interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceGatewaySelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface. The selector is 0-based.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceGateway
Integer.ToolTip: IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.
Integer.Description: IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the subnet of this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the subnet of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: IP address of the selected subnet of this interface.
Integer.Description: IP address of the selected subnet of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Subnet mask of the selected subnet of this interface.
Integer.Description: Subnet mask of the selected subnet of this interface.

Integer.Name: DeviceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different devices on this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different devices on this interface. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList". The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

String.Name: DeviceID
String.ToolTip: Interface wide unique identifier of the selected device.
String.Description: Interface wide unique identifier of the selected device. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

String.Name: DeviceVendorName
String.Description: Name of the device vendor. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

String.Name: DeviceModelName
String.Description: Name of the device model. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

Enumeration.Name: DeviceAccessStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Gives the device's access status at the moment of the last execution of "DeviceUpdateList".
Enumeration.Description: Gives the device's access status at the moment of the last execution of "DeviceUpdateList". This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

String.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
String.ToolTip: Serial number of the remote device.
String.Description: Serial number of the remote device. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

String.Name: DeviceUserID
String.ToolTip: User-programmable device identifier of the remote device.
String.Description: User-programmable device identifier of the remote device. This value only changes on execution of "DeviceUpdateList".

Integer.Name: GevDeviceIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: Current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: Current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Command.Name: AutoForceIP
Command.ToolTip: Automatically Forces Cameras on interface to an ipAddress on the same subnet as the interface.
Command.Description: Automatically Forces Cameras on interface to an ipAddress on the same subnet as the interface.
